page.title: 16The Social Centre
page.content: The{Social Centre}was built in 1981.It took 9 months to build. The eight rooms in the{Social Centre}are the {toilets, a concert room, lounge, beer {cellar,store room, kitchen,}and an {office.}The{Social Centre}is used for {dancing shows,wedding receptions}and {birthday parties.}There is 1 full time worker,Mr Mosley,who is the manager, 3 cleaners and 3 bar staff. All the staff in the{Social Centre like to work there.It will hold 450 people at the most for a concert,but they like 300 for comfort.In a week about 600 old age pensioners come to the{Social Centre}during the day. Children come to the{Centre}for a night out,to dance or to watch films. People come from{Clay Cross,Tupton, {Danesmoor,North Wingfield}and {Stretton.}The{Centre}is important for entertainment and socializing.
